scripts.minify: jsmin -o ./dist/discordBot.js ./build/discordBot.js && jsmin -o ./dist/disupload.js ./build/disupload.js && jsmin -o ./dist/httpServer.js ./build/httpServer.js && jsmin -o ./dist/index.js ./build/index.js && jsmin -o ./dist/types/directory.js ./build/types/directory.js && jsmin -o ./dist/types/file.js ./build/types/file.js && jsmin -o ./dist/types/filePart.js ./build/types/filePart.js && jsmin -o ./dist/util/deleteFromArray.js ./build/util/deleteFromArray.js && jsmin -o ./dist/util/checkIfFolderExists.js ./build/util/checkIfFolderExists.js
